title: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in library outline view
description: Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, it is not possible. Instead, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
OB: When trying to select any item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of allowing the item to be selected.
EB: When attempting to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, the item should be selected without the focus jumping to the library file node.
SR: Steps to reproduce:1. Open the library outline view.2. Attempt to select any item in the view for the first time.
